https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k7LXYTnx5bJVNgW1WivLBiEzL6F.jpg A rendition of the Spanish popular saying “drowning in a glass of water”, which translates: to be overwhelmed by events that appear to be much larger than what they are in reality. Drowning In a Glass of Water
